long_description: The women's Lyness Coat is a modern version of the classic Helly Hansen Fisherman's raincoat. Waterproof, windproof and breathable, it sports a great retro look and extra attention to detail. Polyester shell fabric is is fully seam-sealed and laminated with 2-layer Helly Tech(R) protection for waterproof, breathable performance. Durable Water Repellent finish beads up light precipitation. Quick-dry lining and back vent enhance airflow and comfort. Fully lined, adjustable hood helps protect your head from wind and rain. The Helly Hansen Lyness Coat features a center-front stormflap with snap closures and 2 snap-flap hand pockets.
short_description: The women's Lyness Coat is a modern version of the classic Helly Hansen Fisherman's raincoat. Waterproof, windproof and breathable, it sports a great retro look and extra attention to detail.
